Interface IHDBOfficerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
HDBOfficerServiceImpl
public interface IHDBOfficerService

  • Method Details

    • registerForProject

      HDBOfficerRegistration registerForProject(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Creates a registration request for an HDB Officer to handle a specific project. Performs eligibility checks (not already applicant, not handling conflicting project).
      Parameters:
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer applying.
      projectId - ID of the project to register for.
      Returns:
      The created HDBOfficerRegistration object (status PENDING), or null if ineligible.

    • getOfficerRegistrations

      List<HDBOfficerRegistration> getOfficerRegistrations(String officerNric)
      Retrieves all registration requests made by a specific HDB Officer.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer.
      Returns:
      List of HDBOfficerRegistration objects.

    • getPendingRegistrationsForProject

      List<HDBOfficerRegistration> getPendingRegistrationsForProject(int projectId)
      Retrieves pending registration requests for a specific project (for Manager view).
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      Returns:
      List of HDBOfficerRegistration objects with PENDING status.

    • checkOfficerEligibilityForRegistration

      boolean checkOfficerEligibilityForRegistration(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Checks if an officer is eligible to register for a project based on brief's criteria. (Not an applicant for the project, not handling another project in the same period).
      Parameters:
      officerNric - Officer's NRIC.
      projectId - Project ID.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.

    • retrieveApplicationForBooking

      BTOApplication retrieveApplicationForBooking(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves a BTO application suitable for booking (Status: SUCCESSFUL) using the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant whose application to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object, or null if no successful application found for this NRIC.
